 DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN (Movie)

Detailed Description

Developers can manipulate framed stream data like Gif animation by Movie class. 

 // create Movie object from stream.
 Movie* movie = Movie::decodeStreamN(is);
 // setup the duration of which frame you want to pick.
 movie->setTime(100);
 // draw frame to canvas.
 Canvas canvas(bmp);
 movie->draw(&canvas, 0.0f, 0.0f);
